review: We bought the fire stick to hook up to my daughters TV which had no other content other than a blue ray player hooked up to it. Now through the magic of the fire stick I no longer have to watch blues clues or rug rats or pippi long stocking on my tv. I now have the freedom to watch sports  once again or perhaps movies with things that explode. These are the things my tv was made for. Thank you fire stick. Thank you

review: Purchased this recently to use in my family room where I had an old Samsung Bluray with a few older apps.The bang for the buck on this device is fantastic, and everything has been running smooth. The only glitch I noticed so far was the audio desyncing from the video in HBOGO, but it works fine on other apps. It's easy to navigate, has all my content from Amazon, and the wife and kids can use it seamlessly. So far I'm impressed, though I do with it came with the voice remote :)
